name: Soccer Pinball Thrills
description: Choose the table, shoot the ball, and embark on the fast-paced hunt for high-score. Thanks to the state-of-the-art physics, these high-speed pinballs react with total realism. The 3 varied soccer-themed tables will give you the ultimate “kick”.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6x, AMD Radeon HD 4x Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Got during the Autumn sale for under $1 and it was a lot better than expected, recommended!  6 camera choices, 3 tables, will play again.  Full screen only and no seen plunger if you care about that.  I played this with Windows 10 at native 1920 by 1080, no problems.  You can turn off the music, which I did, some graphics options, and the ball noise is optional.  It's a fair pinball game, not up to the quality of more expensive ones, but worth their price, sure.  Not realistic pinball style, if that is what you are looking for, see Pinball Arcade and Zacarria Pinball.
